Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review feedback from the previous playtest and categorize it into mechanics that need refinement.
Meet with @ldes-1 and @lpro-1 to discuss the feedback and prioritize which mechanics to refine first.
Start refining the core mechanics based on the prioritized feedback. Focus on player movement and shooting mechanics.
Continue refining mechanics. Test changes in the development environment to ensure they work as intended.
Document the changes made and prepare a summary for the team. Send an update email to @prod-1 and @ldes-1.
